metadata.title: CVE-2019-14858 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Ansible engine 2.x up to 2.8 and Ansible tower3.x up to 3.5. When a module has an argument_spec with sub parametersmarked as no_log, passing an invalid parameter name to the module willcause the task to fail before the no_log options in the sub parameters areprocessed. As a result, data in the sub parameter fields will not be maskedand will be displayed if Ansible is run with increased verbosity andpresent in the module invocation arguments for the task.

criterions.comment: ansible package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
